input_text.Prompt:
Given a item title and item specifications, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Melrose International Frosted Winterberry Wreath, 26-Inch

Item specifications:
Cedar, with laurel leaves and clumps of white berries with just a light dusting of snow
All stems are wired for easy shaping to full size
Suitable for use inside or outside in a protected area
This wreath adds a touch of warmth to any room or door

Product description:
input_text.Response A: This wreath is made of cedar with laurel leaves and clumps of white berries with a light dusting of snow.  All stems are wired for easy shaping to full size.  It can be used inside or outside in a protected area.  This wreath adds a touch of warmth to any room or door.
input_text.Response B: Introducing the Melrose International Frosted Winterberry Wreath, a stunning addition to any room or door. This 26-inch wreath is crafted with high-quality materials, including cedar, laurel leaves, and clumps of white berries, all adorned with a light dusting of snow. The wired stems make it easy to shape the wreath to its full size, ensuring a beautiful and full display. Whether you hang it inside or in a protected area outside, this wreath is sure to add a touch of warmth and elegance to your home. So why wait? Order your Melrose International Frosted Winterberry Wreath today and experience the beauty of winter all season long.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
